question:
[Scott] meet his uncle, [Dale], at the baseball game, excited for their team to win. [Linda] and her brother [Scott] wanted to go out and play, but [Linda]'s mom, [Melissa], told them they had to stay in and do their chores. [Morgan] attended the graduation of her sister's son [Robert]. [Harry] took his sister [Valerie] too the zoo but his sister [Melissa] could n't come because she had to work. [Kenneth] and his son [Robert] went to the cinema together. [Robert] and his son [Kenneth] went to look at cars. [Robert] ended up buying the Mustang. [Valerie] took her sister, [Morgan], out to dinner for her birthday. [Robert] asked his brother [Darryl] if he would come help him fix his car next weekend.
Question: How is [Dale] related to [Darryl]?
